accurate.label: Accurate
accurate.description: Reputable source with no disagreement and no related false claims

accurate with considerations.label: Accurate With Considerations
accurate with considerations.description: Reputable source with little disagreement and related false claims

unsubstantiated.label: Unsubstantiated
unsubstantiated.description: Mixture of reputability and disagreement associated to claim reviews

inaccurate.label: Inaccurate
inaccurate.description: Not credible source with high disagreement

not verifiable post.label: Not Verifiable Post
not verifiable post.description: Absolutely not a credible source with highly-biased content

LANG.tweet tagged as: This tweet has been tagged as %s
LANG.provide claim: If you think this is not accurate please provide a claim and a URL to a post that supports that claim.
LANG.provide additional info: Please provide some additional information in the comment
